tool.name: SAGA.grid_calculus.18
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayA False isArrayB False output_data_C $output_data_C name SAGA.grid_calculus.18 A $A B $B prefer $prefer response $response outputType_C $OutputSection_C.outputType_C transmissionMode_C $OutputSection_C.transmissionMode_C

param.name: A
param.label: Dividend
param.help: Dividend The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: B
param.label: Divisor
param.help: Divisor The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_C
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_C
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
